qas.question: How many actual people were used for the opening sequence of Spectre?
Estrella was played by which actress?
When was the opening scene of Spectre filmed?
Where was the pre-title scene in Spectre filmed?
In which country were the scenes with Detlef Bothe shot?
Who was cast as Marco Sciarra?
What character did Stephanie Sigma portray?
Alessandro who was cast as Estrella?

plausible_answers.text: the pre-title sequence set in Mexico

qas.question: Over one hundred extras were hired for what?
In February 2005, how many extras were hired for the pre-title sequence?

context: In addition to the principal cast, <a1_0><a6_0>Alessandro <b8_0>Cremona<b8_0/><a6_0/><a1_0/> was cast as Marco Sciarra, <a2_0>Stephanie Sigman<a2_0/> was cast as <a7_0>Estrella<a7_0/>, and <b9_0>Detlef Bothe<b9_0/> was cast as a villain for scenes shot in <a5_0>Austria.<a5_0/> In <a3_0>February 2015<a3_0/> over <a0_0><b11_0>fifteen hundred<b11_0/><a0_0/> extras were hired for <b10_0>the pre-title sequence set in <a4_0>Mexico<b10_0/><a4_0/>, though they were duplicated in the film, giving the effect of around ten thousand extras.
